about.title: Arnaud Babol - Developer
about.description: I am a student in my final and 5th year at ISEN-Lille which is an engineering college in Electronics and Computer Science in France (I can speak French/English). I major in Computer Science and I am looking for a job or an internship from 2nd March 2015.

left.text:
Grunt is really easy to use.
I love it because it boosts my productivity.

experiences.title: Geckoboard London
experiences.description: Geckoboard is a real-time dashboard that gives you instant access to your most important metrics.
descriptionLi: Create widgets using RESTful API from service like Google (Adwords, Drive...), Twitter, Mixpanel...
Troubleshoot and resolve difficult problems relating to the Geckoboard application.
Avoid regression thanks to unit testing implementation
Write supporting documents (Best practice, How-To...)
Discuss with the customers to improve Geckoboard's products.

projects.title: ScaleWS
projects.subtitle: Hack a body Scale
projects.description: Get, process and visualize data acquired from a wifi body scale (Withings WS50).
descriptionLi: Hack the scale (DNS Spoofing)
Provide a JSON RESTful API (Node.JS + MongoDB)
Create a web application
Shared collections between server/client (like Meteor.js)

projects.title: Github Top Repo
projects.subtitle: Geckoboard coding challenge
projects.description:
Little coding challenge given by Geckoboard to check "my skills", I was finally hired and I did my internship with them during the summer of 2014.

They gave me a design and the requirements were:
descriptionLi: A main page which shows a list of up to 20 repositories sorted by the number of stars/watchers (highest first)
Each item displays the repo title, the number of stars/watchers and the number of forks
Clicking on the title shows a more detailed description of the repository containing the description, homepage URL and any other relevant information.

projects.title: Babol.me v1
projects.subtitle: My old portfolio
projects.description: Use of Flat Design techniques to make a responsive website. I was really proud of myself back in 2012 ^^.

projects.title: Hackenbush
projects.subtitle: Logic Game Hackenbush
projects.description: Developement of the logic game Hackenbush
descriptionLi: Save/Load your game
Can play against an artificial intelligence
Following Test Driven Development

projects.title: EducationAll
projects.subtitle: Fun and simple way for children to learn
projects.description: Fun and simple way for children to learn.
descriptionLi: Challenge your friends
Games and scores automatically synchronized with an SQL Server hosted on the Windows Azure Cloud

projects.title: JGASolver
projects.subtitle: A Genetic Algorithms Framework
projects.description: JGASolver is a framework written in Java which allows the user to solve their genetic optimization problems.

projects.title: Robot Bille
projects.subtitle: Can a robot move like a ball?
descriptionLi: Finding the robot/ball path using our program written in C
Store result in a JSON file and display the path in a canvas
Comparaison with the shortest path using Dijkstra's algorihm

contribution.title: AtomLinter
contribution.description: Code linting for Atom (github's text editor).
descriptionLi: Add possibility to display every code/syntax errors of the selected page and to go to the error with a click.
Improve the configuration screen
